HELP_YOU_LOW_REPLY: You're lying. Why would you want to help me?
HELP_YOU_HIGH_REPLY: Well if you are here to help me, lets talk.
ASSERT_AUTHORITY_REPLY: Good, you can help me then.
RELEASE_All_HOSTAGES_REPLY: I am not releasing anyone until I get my money.
ASK_INTENTIONS_REPLY: I am having a bad day and have ran out of options.
ASSURE_SAFETY_LOW_REPLY: I don't believe you. I need to know I will not be harmed.
ASSURE_SAFETY_HIGH_REPLY: Are you sure? You seem honest but I have my doubts.
WHOS_THERE_REPLY: I have a young man with me.
DOWNPLAY_REPLY: I really do not want to make this situation any worse.
BACKGROUND_REPLY: My background is not a concern to you. What I need is money.
GIVE_UP_REPLY: Promise me that you can give me money and I'll come out.
MAKE_OFFERING_REPLY: That is not what I asked for. Stop playing around and get me money.
WHY_MONEY_REPLY: I need the money to pay off bills.
OFFER_ALTERNATIVES_REPLY: If you can't help me then this you are wasting my time.
WHY_HOSTAGES_REPLY: I did not want this to happen. I was trying to rob the jewelry store.
VENT_REPLY: This situation is all messed up. I do not want anyone to get hurt.
MAKING_WORSE_REPLY: If you guys did not show up, I would not have had to take the hostage in the first place
WHAT_BILLS_REPLY: I have medical bills that need to be payed.
REFUSAL_REPLY: I need the money. I cannot afford these bills currently.
WHY_HAVE_MEDICAL_REPLY: My wife was in the hospital.
EMPATHY_REPLY: You do not understand how I feel.
HAD_CANCER_REPLY: Yes, she had cancer, she did not make it.
START_SCENARIO: Situation report: Single man sitting in a jewelry store. Armed status unknown. Hostage status unknown. Proceed with caution!
